meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Byron Merrill Patrick Theobald Anand Kandaswamy Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7622.

td.p: Byron Merrill, a network engineer from Lincoln, Nebraska
Patrick Theobald, a product manager from Nashville, Tennessee
Anand Kandaswamy, an economist from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $35,001)

tr.td: WHAT HAPPENED WHEN?
BUSINESS PAIRINGS
FACTS & FIGURES
VOLCANOES
FOREWORDS
AFTER WORDS

(lock game)

$7,000
AnandWhat is K
$1,000
K')

George Eastman called it "a strong, incisive sort of letter"
Anand
Patrick
Byron
3-day champion: $57,001
2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Anand
Patrick
Byron

(including 2 DDs),

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
